I found this movie to be quite refreshing. I am so sick of the ho-hum cookie cutter movies out there right now. This one breaks the mold and stands out as great! The lead character is nuts, but gorgeous and carries the film really well. Great casting decision with her. She brings energy and boldness to the screen, I was very impressed. This movie is one for everyone in my opinion, it appeals to all movie tastes with action, drama, romance and suspense. Also appealing to the travel enthusiast, as they take you to many beautiful places throughout the world. If you couldn&#039;t catch this one in the theater, I suggest you add it to your DVD shelf! Very cool film all around!



Enjoy
